display_name: Non-Tricyclic Antidepressants Other Than monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI) (Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2))
description: Participant taking NON-TRICYCLIC ANTIDEPRESSANTS OTHER THAN monoamine oxidase inhibitor (MAOI) within two weeks of the Sleep Heart Health Study Visit Two (SHHS2) visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
